SymbolDef.name: HLA
SymbolDef.descr: High Level Architecture (HLA) property, type, and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: SiteId
PropertyDef.descr: The Site ID of this application instance. Site IDs may be the same for multiple applications as long as each application's Application ID is unique. Valid Site IDs range from 0 to 65535.

PropertyDef.name: ApplicationId
PropertyDef.descr: The Application ID of this application instance. Application IDs should be unique for all applications participating in a given exercise from a given site. For example, the Application ID should be unique for all simulations sharing the same Exercise ID and Site ID. Valid Application IDs range from 0 to 65535.

PropertyDef.name: EntityId
PropertyDef.descr: The Entity ID of the user entity. Valid Entity IDs range from 0 to 65535.

PropertyDef.name: LocalParameters
PropertyDef.descr: The local parameters to be passed into the RTI's connect() function. For OpenRTI, this should be of the form rti://[ip_address]:[port] where [ip_address] and [port] are the IP address and port of the machine running the remote RTINode server.

PropertyDef.name: FederationExecutionName
PropertyDef.descr: The name of the federation execution to join.

PropertyDef.name: FederateName
PropertyDef.descr: The federate name of this machine.

PropertyDef.name: FederateType
PropertyDef.descr: The federate type of this machine (optional).

PropertyDef.name: RPRFOM2FilePath
PropertyDef.descr: The full file path of the RPR FOM v2 XML file.

PropertyDef.name: AttributeUpdateRate
PropertyDef.descr: The amount of time between sending attribute updates in seconds. Attribute data is only sent if it has changed.

PropertyDef.name: Endianness
PropertyDef.descr: The endianness in which attribute data is broadcast.

SetDef.name: Configuration
SetDef.descr: The root configuration set provides access to all other inner configuration sets.

SetDef.name: Entity
SetDef.descr: This set provides site, application, and entity based configurations.

SetDef.name: Connection
SetDef.descr: This set provides connection based configuration such as federation execution name and address.

SetDef.name: Federate
SetDef.descr: This set provides federate based configuration such as federate name and type.

SetDef.name: Options
SetDef.descr: This set provides general options such as attribute update rate.
